title: Large-Scale Online Learner-Centered Math Microlearning Course: Intensive Short-Term Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Work-centered mathematics competency enhancement program for professionals, operating in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three mathematical modeling procedures for solving workplace problems using microlearning content provided in mobile environments.
Learners can accurately verify the validity of project deliverables with an 80% or higher accuracy rate through a peer assessment system.
Learners perform meaningful interactions at least three times per week on asynchronous discussion platforms to enhance collaborative problem-solving skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
